name: Slack Alert Integration
description: Automatically send Slack notifications when specific events occur in your applications. Perfect for monitoring, alerts, and team communication.

name: Email Campaign Automation
description: Create sophisticated email marketing campaigns with conditional logic, personalization, and behavior-based triggers.

name: Database Sync Pipeline
description: Synchronize data between multiple databases, APIs, and services. Includes error handling, retry logic, and data transformation.

name: Social Media Publisher
description: Automatically publish content across multiple social media platforms with custom scheduling and content optimization.

name: Customer Support Ticket Router
description: Intelligently route support tickets based on content analysis, priority, and team availability. Includes escalation logic.

name: Invoice Processing Workflow
description: Automate invoice processing from receipt to payment tracking. Includes PDF parsing, validation, and approval workflows.

name: Lead Scoring & Nurturing
description: Score leads based on behavior and demographics, then automatically nurture them with personalized content sequences.

name: File Processing Pipeline
description: Process uploaded files through multiple stages including validation, transformation, storage, and notification.
